sql.trim: t1.ID, t1.NAME, t1.AUTHOR_ID, t1.AUTHOR_CODE, t1.AUTHOR_NAME, t1.MEETING_ROOM_ID, t1.MEETING_ROOM_NAME, t1.YN_APPROVE, t1.PRE_START_TIME, t1.START_TIME, t1.END_TIME, t1.HOST_ID, t1.HOST_CODE, t1.HOST_NAME, t1.YN_VALID, t1.CONTENT, t1.MEETING_TYPE_ID, t1.MEETING_TYPE_CODE, t1.MEETING_TYPE_NAME, t1.ATTENDEE_IDS, t1.ATTENDEE_CODES, t1.ATTENDEE_NAMES, t1.NOTE, t1.ATTRIBUTE_01, t1.ATTRIBUTE_02, t1.ATTRIBUTE_03, t1.ATTRIBUTE_04, t1.ATTRIBUTE_05, t1.ATTRIBUTE_06, t1.ATTRIBUTE_07, t1.ATTRIBUTE_08, t1.ATTRIBUTE_09, t1.ATTRIBUTE_10, t1.SECRET_LEVEL, t1.ORG_IDENTITY, t1.CREATED_BY, t1.CREATED_DEPT, t1.CREATION_DATE, t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY, t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP, t1.VERSION,

sql.if: and exists (select 1 from sys_bpm_hist_task os where os.task_b_id_ = t1.id and os.assignee_ = #{bean.currUserId})

if.test: bean.bpmState != null and bean.bpmState !='' and bean.bpmState != 'all'

sql.if:
and v.businessstate_ = #{bean.bpmState}
and exists (select 1 from bpm_client_hist_procinst_v os where os.userid_ = #{bean.currUserId, jdbcType = VARCHAR} and os.dbid_ = v.dbid_)

mapper.select:
select
from MEETING t1 left join sys_bpm_hist_procinst v on t1.id = v.formid_

select
from MEETING t1 left join sys_bpm_hist_procinst v on t1.id = v.formid_

select
from MEETING t1 left join sys_bpm_hist_procinst v on t1.id = v.formid_

NAME,

ATTRIBUTE_10,
SECRET_LEVEL,
ORG_IDENTITY,
CREATED_BY,

LAST_UPDATED_BY,
LAST_UPDATE_DATE,
LAST_UPDATE_IP,
VERSION,

insert into MEETING( ID , NAME , AUTHOR_ID , AUTHOR_CODE , AUTHOR_NAME , MEETING_ROOM_ID , MEETING_ROOM_NAME , YN_APPROVE , PRE_START_TIME , START_TIME , END_TIME , HOST_ID , HOST_CODE , HOST_NAME , YN_VALID , CONTENT , MEETING_TYPE_ID , MEETING_TYPE_CODE , MEETING_TYPE_NAME , ATTENDEE_IDS , ATTENDEE_CODES , ATTENDEE_NAMES , NOTE , ATTRIBUTE_01 , ATTRIBUTE_02 , ATTRIBUTE_03 , ATTRIBUTE_04 , ATTRIBUTE_05 , ATTRIBUTE_06 , ATTRIBUTE_07 , ATTRIBUTE_08 , ATTRIBUTE_09 , ATTRIBUTE_10 , SECRET_LEVEL , ORG_IDENTITY , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DEPT , CREATION_DATE , LAST_UPDATED_BY , LAST_UPDATE_DATE , LAST_UPDATE_IP , VERSION )
select #{item.id,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.name,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.authorId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.authorCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.authorName,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.meetingRoomId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.meetingRoomName,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.ynApprove,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.preStartTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} , #{item.startTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} , #{item.endTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} , #{item.hostId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.hostCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.hostName,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.ynValid,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.content,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.meetingTypeId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.meetingTypeCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.meetingTypeName,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attendeeIds,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attendeeCodes,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attendeeNames,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.note,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute01,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute02,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute03,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute04,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute05,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute06,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute07,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute08,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute09,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} , #{item.attribute10,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} , #{item.secretLevel,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.orgIdentity,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.createdBy,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.createdDept,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.creationDate,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} , #{item.lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.lastUpdateDate,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} , #{item.lastUpdateIp,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.version,jdbcType = DECIMAL} from dual
mapper.update:
update MEETING
ID = #{id,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
NAME = #{name,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
AUTHOR_ID = #{authorId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
AUTHOR_CODE = #{authorCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
AUTHOR_NAME = #{authorName,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
MEETING_ROOM_ID = #{meetingRoomId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
MEETING_ROOM_NAME = #{meetingRoomName,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
YN_APPROVE = #{ynApprove,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
PRE_START_TIME = #{preStartTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} ,
START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} ,
END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} ,
HOST_ID = #{hostId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
HOST_CODE = #{hostCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
HOST_NAME = #{hostName,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
YN_VALID = #{ynValid,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
MEETING_TYPE_ID = #{meetingTypeId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
MEETING_TYPE_CODE = #{meetingTypeCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
MEETING_TYPE_NAME = #{meetingTypeName,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTENDEE_IDS = #{attendeeIds,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTENDEE_CODES = #{attendeeCodes,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTENDEE_NAMES = #{attendeeNames,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
NOTE = #{note,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_01 = #{attribute01,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_02 = #{attribute02,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_03 = #{attribute03,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_04 = #{attribute04,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_05 = #{attribute05,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_06 = #{attribute06,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_07 = #{attribute07,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_08 = #{attribute08,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_09 = #{attribute09,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} ,
ATTRIBUTE_10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} ,
SECRET_LEVEL = #{secretLevel,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ORG_IDENTITY = #{orgIdentity,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
CREATED_DEPT = #{createdDept,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} ,
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} ,
LAST_UPDATE_IP = #{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
VERSION = version+1
where id = #{id} and version = #{version}

update.foreach: update MEETING set ID = #{item.id,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , NAME = #{item.name,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , AUTHOR_ID = #{item.authorId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , AUTHOR_CODE =
